argumentText:
ARGUMENT
y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | frecsuclem1.h | |- G = ( g e. _V |-> { x | ( E. m e. _om ( dom g = suc m /\ x e. ( F ` ( g ` m ) ) ) \/ ( dom g = (/) /\ x e. A ) ) } ) |
| 2 |  | #P_nnon | |- ( B e. _om -> B e. On ) |
| 3 |  | #P_suceloni | |- ( B e. On -> suc B e. On ) |
| 4 |  | #P_onss | |- ( suc B e. On -> suc B C_ On ) |
| 5 | 2, 3, 4 | #P_3syl | |- ( B e. _om -> suc B C_ On ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_3ad2ant3 | |- ( ( F Fn _V /\ A e. V /\ B e. _om ) -> suc B C_ On ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- recs ( G ) = recs ( G ) |
| 8 | 1 | #P_frectfr | |- ( ( F Fn _V /\ A e. V ) -> A. y ( Fun G /\ ( G ` y ) e. _V ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_tfri1d | |- ( ( F Fn _V /\ A e. V ) -> recs ( G ) Fn On ) |
| 10 |  | #P_fndm | |- ( recs ( G ) Fn On -> dom recs ( G ) = On ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( ( F Fn _V /\ A e. V ) -> dom recs ( G ) = On ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_sseq2d | |- ( ( F Fn _V /\ A e. V ) -> ( suc B C_ dom recs ( G ) <-> suc B C_ On ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( F Fn _V /\ A e. V /\ B e. _om ) -> ( suc B C_ dom recs ( G ) <-> suc B C_ On ) ) |
| 14 | 6, 13 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ( F Fn _V /\ A e. V /\ B e. _om ) -> suc B C_ dom recs ( G ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_ssdmres | |- ( suc B C_ dom recs ( G ) <-> dom ( recs ( G ) |` suc B ) = suc B ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_sylib | |- ( ( F Fn _V /\ A e. V /\ B e. _om ) -> dom ( recs ( G ) |` suc B ) = suc B ) |
